summary: A charming but devious man conspires to bilk a wealthy veterinarian of her money.
cast: Ashley Scott|Aiden Turner|Jennifer Taylor|Jason Brooks|Carrie Wiita|Thor Knai|Susan Blakely|Betsy Baker|Blake Bertrand|Nakia Burrise|Cosimo Canale|Kristin Carey|Kent Faulcon|Briton Green|Jon Mack|Tina Redmond|JJ Snyder|Mary Alexandra Stiefvater|Meli Alexander
title: El novio perfecto
